VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v2_mutasi_pengaman` AS select `aa`.`id` AS `id`,`bb`.`id` AS `idpengaman`,`aa`.`idall` AS `idall`,`aa`.`a1` AS `a1`,`aa`.`a` AS `a`,`aa`.`b` AS `b`,`aa`.`c1` AS `c1`,`aa`.`c` AS `c`,`aa`.`d` AS `d`,`aa`.`e` AS `e`,`aa`.`f` AS `f`,`aa`.`g` AS `g`,`aa`.`h` AS `h`,`aa`.`i` AS `i`,`aa`.`j` AS `j`,`aa`.`noreg` AS `noreg`,`aa`.`thn_perolehan` AS `thn_perolehan`,`aa`.`jml_barang` AS `jml_barang`,`aa`.`satuan` AS `satuan`,`aa`.`harga` AS `harga`,`aa`.`jml_harga` AS `jml_harga`,`aa`.`asal_usul` AS `asal_usul`,`aa`.`kondisi` AS `kondisi`,`aa`.`status_barang` AS `status_barang`,`aa`.`tgl_update` AS `tgl_update`,`aa`.`tahun` AS `tahun`,`aa`.`gambar` AS `gambar`,`aa`.`dokumen` AS `dokumen`,`aa`.`dokumen_ket` AS `dokumen_ket`,`aa`.`dokumen_file` AS `dokumen_file`,`aa`.`nilai_appraisal` AS `nilai_appraisal`,`aa`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`aa`.`uid` AS `uid`,`aa`.`id_lama` AS `id_lama`,`aa`.`tgl_sensus` AS `tgl_sensus`,`aa`.`jml_barang_tmp` AS `jml_barang_tmp`,`aa`.`idawal` AS `idawal`,`aa`.`jml_gambar` AS `jml_gambar`,`bb`.`tgl_pengamanan` AS `tgl_pengamanan`,`bb`.`biaya_pengamanan` AS `biaya_pengamanan`,`bb`.`tambah_aset` AS `tambah_aset`,`bb`.`uraian_kegiatan` AS `uraian_kegiatan`,`bb`.`ket` AS `ket`,`aa`.`e1` AS `e1`,if((((`aa`.`f` = '02') or (`aa`.`f` = '03')) and (`aa`.`kondisi` = 3)),0,if((`aa`.`kondisi` <= 3),1,2)) AS `aset_tetap`,`aa`.`staset` AS `staset`,`aa`.`verifikasi` AS `verifikasi` from (`buku_induk` `aa` join `pengamanan` `bb` on(((`bb`.`idbi_awal` = `aa`.`idawal`) and (`bb`.`tgl_pengamanan` < `aa`.`tgl_buku`)))) where ((`aa`.`id` <> `aa`.`idawal`) and (`aa`.`idawal` <> 0) and (`aa`.`idawal` is not null))
